channel.title: Two Port Forwarding Questions
channel.description:
I have started a server, and i think i have edited it very well, and I'm ready to let other people join. The only thing is, I have to port forward. Now I know what to do and stuff. Port forwarding is letting people into your computer. I am worried that if they can get in to my computer, they can screw things up. I know they can only get in through moparscape, but is it possible from there they can screw up things on my computer?
Second Question, Let's say they can't, but how much download/upload will having, say, 20 players on my server use?

item.title: Two Port Forwarding Questions
item.dc:creator: @Cyber_Punk Cyber Punk
item.description:
@Cyber_Punk wrote:

i have T3, is that good enough?

Read full topic

item.title: Two Port Forwarding Questions
item.dc:creator: @Cyber_Punk Cyber Punk
item.description:
@Cyber_Punk wrote:

okay thanks a lot, but i was more thinking about the monthy internet cost. Would it exceed my upload/download limit?

Read full topic

item.title: Two Port Forwarding Questions
item.dc:creator: @hellzowner hellzowner
item.description:
@hellzowner wrote:

first of all they arnt on your computer you just forwarded your router so people can connect to it and you cant get hacked.

Second for 20 players you would probably need T1 internet

Read full topic
